subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Shea Weber had an autographed photograph from his teammate Peter Forsberg sitting on top of his gear Monday as the Predators wrapped up a disappointing end to what had been a promising season.
snippet: Defenseman Shea Weber had an autographed photograph from his teammate Peter Forsberg sitting on top of his gear Monday as the Predators wrapped up a disappointing end to what had been a promising season.
